website_summaries.verdict: A solid option for a soft rattle that holds up well to washing.
pros: Customers report that rattle is ergonomic and easy for small hands to grab
It also gets top marks for quality and durability, as well as its soft and safe design good for even young babies
cons: Some felt the antennas were too stiff and one consumer reported a defect in which the foam came out of the toy

customer_reviews.title: Baby's First Rattle
customer_reviews.text: Great first toy/rattle for your newborn. Baby can grasp this rattle easily due to the circular design. The material is soft for baby to chew on. Big bold, colors that will be sure to attract your newborn's attention. Shake... shake... shake... this rattle, It is not an irritating sound. Just kind of a soft sound. Great for teething infants. Your baby will love this. I know I do! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Johnson

customer_reviews.title: BEST Rattle!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST first baby rattle I highly recommend. This was my child's first baby rattle and I love that it's light and easy for a baby to grasp when they are still working on those fine motor skills. I loved this rattle so much for my own little one I bought it and recommended it to friends and family! This is the best first rattle, and absolutely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Mom

customer_reviews.title: Three month old said it was love at first sight
customer_reviews.text: At least that's what he seemed to be saying when I put it in his hand. He was smiling, waving it, shaking it, kicking his feet, and started gumming one of the little 'teething feet'. He might have just been excited over the old lady making a fool of herself over him because he's so adorable, but I think it was the rattle. I love the rattle myself - super cute, and soft in case he accidentally bops himself in the face with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jbeyar

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves this rattle! It's been the perfect toy to give her as she's falling asleep. She likes to fall asleep with a toy, but when she's fighting her sleep she waves the toy around and sometimes hits her head with it so I bought her this one. It's the perfect size for her small hands. It's soft enough so she wont hurt herself. And she loves to suck on the little hands and feet as she's trying to fall asleep since she won't take a pacifier.
customer_reviews.author: lanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect first rattle
customer_reviews.text: This is my baby's first rattle and he loves it. The circle design makes it easy for him to grab and hold. And it's small and light enough for him to handle without issue. He's also teething, so the soft texture is soft on his gums. The bright colors and patterns seem to draw his attention and the rattle part isn't too loud. Overall quality is also great.
customer_reviews.author: Jheneya

customer_reviews.title: A baby's favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter reached the hand eye coordination milestone. I believe it most due to this toy and the larger butterfly one by the same maker! The small size makes it easy to grab and also easy to travel with. She automatically ques on to the rattle sound and loves hearing the crunch from the legs. The same can be said with butterfly and its wings. She love following the flapping effect when its above her. Then when it lands on her chest she grab and hugs it. I highly recommend these toys for your new born to encourage hand-eye. The travel size lady bug and the large butterfly is a great combo for diaper bag or home play time.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso Avila

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toy...A MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this rattle. She is currently 6 months and was 4 months when I purchased. She looks at it and smiles and laughs and always seems happy with this toy. It was one of the 2 toys I took with me on a trip out of country. It was the only toy she wanted on our long flights. The colors are attractive and the ergonomic design is perfect for little hands...and mouths ^_^ (They like to put everything in their mouths).
customer_reviews.author: Carib Spice

customer_reviews.title: Washer safe just don’t tell wife.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little toy. I have a 5 month old and aside form his little school bus plush toy this is his second favorite. He plays with it for a good while and doesn’t get bored. I think it’s the material at the end he loves the most. Oh and the little antenna. It’s super easy to Clean in the wash we hung dry it and later hand washed per my wife. I just threw it in the washer I didn’t know there was a certain way. So yeah. Good price. Nothing negative. It’s simple and helps with his teething.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Best toy ever
customer_reviews.text: Best toy ever... When I bought this my daughter was 2 months and has zero interest. Now she literally cracks up likes it's the funniest thing whenever I shake it. I don't know what it is, but my baby loves this little circle bug.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A Allen

customer_reviews.title: We don't go anywhere without Tommy!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it is about this toy, but my 3 month old granddaughter took to it immediately. So much so, I had to buy 2 more...one for my house and one for the babysitters. She could be in the grumpiest mood, but as soon as Tommy (the manufacturer's tag says, Tomy, so we call him "Tommy") comes out, she's all smiles. Perfect size for little but growing hands; perfect texture for teething, perfect shape to hold on to. Just like my granddaughter!
customer_reviews.author: gt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rattle for little hands
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rattle for little hands. My little guy immediately loved this toy. He can easily grasp it, it rattles, and the little leg nubs have that crinkly material inside. Included a bonus ring clip too, can never have to many of those.
customer_reviews.author: SSZLC

customer_reviews.title: Simple but perfect
customer_reviews.text: This has been my son's favorite toy, especially in learning how to grab items. The soft jingle of the rattle easily catches his attention; the circular shape fit perfectly into his hands: and the multiple parts that stick out are perfect for his greedy little mouth! The texture and consistency of the little nubs will be great for when he's teething, too.
customer_reviews.author: Josh and Macquel

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This rattle is safe for babies that are still developing their motor skills. This does not have any plastic parts that could hurt them - so it is great to start out with. The bright colors help catch my little ones attention and he loves to play with it. Also easy to clean - just throw it in the washing machine and let it air dry after. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Rue W.

customer_reviews.title: alien/bug guy, baby approves
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves the bell rattle and cut face on this toy. Not too bug or small. She chews on the antennae and the four feet. They crinkle. If it needs to be washed just get a hot towel with light soap and wipe it down and repeat with a clean cloth to rinse. I have wet the whole thing in a sink of hot water too (light soap) and it doesn't take too long to dry that way either but they recommend the first way on the package. I have used hooks to attach this guy to the activity gym, bouncer and car seat. Baby enjoys it. I did cut the tags off which seemed annoying.
customer_reviews.author: macro mama

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and crinkly :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson when he was just a couple of months old and it quickly became one of his favorite toys to hold and chew on because it crinkles. I don't think it has helped much with his teething because it's not hard enough but he loves to suck on the antennae. He's 8 months old now and my daughter still includes it in the toys she takes with her when they leave home.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to multiple washes
customer_reviews.text: This is my 8 month olds favorite rattle/toy. It was the first thing he could really get a good grip on and he loved the rattle sound. When he started teething he loved chewing on the hands/feet and the antenna. It has held up to multiple washings and I actually purchased a second one so when the first one gets super dirty he doesn't have to go without while I wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Tear in the seam!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this rattle for 2 days, my 5 month old has barely played with it and I just noticed a rip in the seam on the side! I didn't notice it when I first got it, but my baby has not used it very much, so it had to have come that way, or it was just so cheaply made it tore so easy! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: OK, Not amazing
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting a more newborn or 6 month friendly toy. This is kinda thick for the baby to hold. But good thing is that it can be worn like a bracelet. I’d also definitely recommend washing it before use. Best thing about this is the ability to throw in the washer with clothes. I think it’s a good product for older kids but seems unusable for a “first rattle” because of difficulty of holding. And btw it’s not a teething toy as it’s very soft
customer_reviews.author: Mr Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: Ok so for my babey this is a MUST HAVE! Everywhere we go we must take this toy around. I call it a caterpillar 😆 Lol.. My hubby says its a butterfly 😆 but anyway, this made my teething baby so happy! He sleeps with it, he nibbles on it, he loves the sound of the rattle, he likes to just stare at all the colors. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 month old loves the face on this rattle
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl loves the face on this rattle. It’s soft which is great for her to feel a new texture, but it’s a little large for her to hold at three months old although she gets it two handed for short bits of time and I know she’ll grow into it! I love this bc I toss it in the washer and can easily clean it since she loves to throw it and put it in her mouth.
customer_reviews.author: JennyLW

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My baby’s favorite toy! My daughter has been actively playing with this toy for the past month. (She is 4 months now) She loves to chew on it and squish it in her hands. It’s the first toy she showed interest in. I highly recommend this for babies.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Strong
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect fir our grandson !!.... we got it fir him when he was 5 months old and it’s now his favorite !!.... he can hold it and chew on it with ease ...he doesn’t choke because the legs are short enough to put the whole leg in his month so he can bite down hard & not choke !!... well done !!... every part is very Secure !!
customer_reviews.author: kennigirl

customer_reviews.title: Best rattle!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this toy!!! I bought it for him when he was 2 1/2 months old. It is so lightweight he was able to lift it. I read a review that said a 4 month old thought this toy was hilarious and loved to laugh at it. My baby is now four months and laughs and smiles at this toy. He loves it. It entertains him for a good chunk of time and he loves to pick it up and wave it back and forth to hear it jingle. Great toy!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Michelle Benson

customer_reviews.title: This is my grandsons favorite rattle - we showed it to him when he ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my grandsons favorite rattle - we showed it to him when he was just a few weeks old and he would follow it as we moved it in front of him. Now that he is 3 months - it is his favorite to hold and chew on. I think what really drew him in was the face on it. Great rattle....
customer_reviews.author: Country Gal

customer_reviews.title: Love this rattle
customer_reviews.text: Love this rattle! Have bought two already. About to buy number three. Wish the dog didn't like it as much as the baby! Very cute, light weight. Baby loves this rattle! When very little, we would put it around her hand or ankle. She loved the scrunchy sound it made and it is nice and soft fabric. Time for me to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jud

customer_reviews.title: An absolute favorite for my baby!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this so much, it's a little bell rattle inside so it's not obnoxiously loud, but she loves it, it's soft enough when she's shaking it and bonks herself in the head with it it doesn't hurt her, light enough for her little hands to grip, it's one of her favorites for sure. Baby girl is 7 months old for reference ☺ 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.author: Savage_TheQueen

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and good rattle. One recently bought some plush tethers with rattles so cheap they’re barely heard through the materials, so I appreciate this one for my 5 month old grandson. He’s happy with it too! LOL
customer_reviews.author: EmLavigne75

customer_reviews.title: Baby's favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: Our baby is 3 months old now and she loves her bee! Wait, no - she adores it! :) Bee chases the fussy away and is a great distraction when we're trying to take photos and get baby to smile. :) We hand-wash and air-dry it (haven't tried putting in the washer). The toy is soft and the ends are well-designed for baby to grasp. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Clover14

customer_reviews.title: Colorful. Soft. Rattle sound. Chewable for teething babies. Easy to hold. Great gift idea.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son when he was 3months old. At 3months old he loved the sound & colors. Now he's 6months old & still plays with it daily. He's learned to hold the rattle & shake it himself. Still loves the rattle sound & colors. He's constantly chewing on some part of the rattle since he started teething. We bring this toy with us everytime we leave the house.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful toy. My six week old grandson is too small to play with it so I just fastened it to his bassinet to look at and he kept staring at it! I’d shake it for him and he was mesmerized by it. Kept him precoccupied. I think he’ll continue to love it when he’s bigger and can hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 4 months and loves to drool and put things in her mouth. She really likes this rattle. It intrigues her and she loves putting the round parts in her mouth. She can easily grab it and manipulate it and sometimes it ends up around her arm and she will just move her arm around to hear the rattle noise.
customer_reviews.author: PinkDove

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but disliked that it was not packaged in protection plastic seeing it's for a child. Review... After being played with for a few short days by a 3month old baby it has started to fall apart. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Patti Bee

customer_reviews.title: This caught my baby’s attention when I first introduced it ...
customer_reviews.text: This caught my baby’s attention when I first introduced it at one month and now shes two months and smiles with it everytime i bring it out...the rattling noise stops her from crying as soon as she hears it...i take it with me everywhere i hook it to stroller with other toys or use string to tie it there too...she stares at it for long time and likes sound :)
customer_reviews.author: Ela

customer_reviews.title: Minus the antennae, best first rattle!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it. He can now grab it himself and shake it. I gave it a score of 4 instead of 5 for a safety reason. The antennae, though cute, were going in his eyes. Since he loved the rattle, we just cut them off. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: M. D.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, soft, colorful
customer_reviews.text: I love that this rattle is soft. I bought several hard plastic rattles that my son keeps hitting himself in the face with, so this is perfect! It also comes with a ring attachment if you want to clip it to other places i.e. carseat, jumper, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncusty

customer_reviews.title: Amuses the baby! Became her friend lol
customer_reviews.text: My babe just turned 4 months old, but she's loved this toy since she was like 2 months old. It is her favorite toy! Not sure what is so special about it but she laughs and smiles at it all the time. We Now call it her friend Tomy and he has to go everywhere with her.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great Mouthing Toy
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t get it for teething but I love the safe little parts that my 5 month old can actually fit in her mouth! She’s going through that stage but most toys she can’t fit in her mouth and that leaves her frustrated. This one she can so she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect infant first rattle.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 1/2 month old grandson loved chewing on this and it is was easy for him to hold. He loved it so much, I bought a second one for him. It’s small enough to be convenient for traveling. Now it is my go to toy to adorn baby shower gifts. I also have used it to attach a baby shower/new birth gift card to make a nice presentation.
customer_reviews.author: RoseW

customer_reviews.title: Great first rattle
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and colorful rattle. My 3 month old enjoys it even thought she hasn’t quite figured out how to hold it with her hands. It usually ends up around her wrist or being kicked but either way she has fun with it so I'm satisfied. I like that it is soft so that when she does start holding it with her hands she won’t hurt herself if she accidentally hits herself in the face with it. Great for a first rattle
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Great rattle toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 month old boy. He is now almost 3 months and this is one of his favorites. Always smiles and gets excited when you rattle this for him to see. Rattle bell is pretty good, not too loud but also not whisper quiet. I recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: My 6 mo old used this to teethe. One of herfavs
customer_reviews.text: Cute rattling bug.. This was one of my favorites to use in the carseat. My baby would put one of the toys "legs" in her mouth, bite down, and pull it out. It was soothing to her sore gums. This gave me peace of mind that she wasn't going to hurt herself but could still get relief when in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Soft and colorful
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves this!! She puts its through her hands and keeps on her. She love chewing on it, especially the ears. It’s a great little toy. She has been since she was 3 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great baby toy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son when he was around 1 month old. He loves it so much I have actually bought 2 so that when I'm washing 1, he has another. It's still his favorite toy and he is 6 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Jhinae R. Noody

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: It was just average everyday rattle suitable for everyday use
customer_reviews.author: Bridge-Heanne Knights

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful rattle
customer_reviews.text: My 4 1/2 month old absolutely loves this rattle. It's easy for his little hands to grip and put in his mouth; he loves biting on the legs. It is also very durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Shake rattle and Roll
customer_reviews.text: By her third month, wearing her first rattle on her wrist, our little baby doll was entranced. Now she can squeeze the soft crinkle sound, stare at the bright colors, begin to teeth and shake her rattle. She’s five months and keeps this first toy ever so nearby.
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: Good but too thick for tiny hands to hold
customer_reviews.text: It took baby a couple months to be able to hold (her hand was too small to grasp around because it's a little thick) she's 6 months now can hold it great likes to chew on the legs
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Trow

customer_reviews.title: light weight
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old granddaughter loves this! It is one of her favorites. She can hold it easily and there are no parts that will hurt her. She has hit her head with some that have hard parts on the rattle.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and soft—great starter rattle for 3 month old
customer_reviews.text: Our three month old loves this rattle. It is perfect size and weight for him to handle and play with. I like how soft it is, because he is still young enough that he hits himself in the face with it unintentionally. He primarily chews on the plastic ring, and occasionally the crinkle hands. The plastic ring is also nice to use for hanging on his car seat handle when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer-GC

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy for Home or On the Go- it’s a Winner!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this toy! It can go on his arm or he can hold it on the ring. He puts it in his mouth and he is captivated by the rattle. It all looks to be well connected too- nothing seems loose like it could be pulled off by him. This is a great little toy for at home or on the go entertainment and comfort. And it’s inexpensive!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect first toy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect soft rattle! My baby is a year old and this is still his favorite! The shape is easily grasped by curious fingers. For cleaning, you can just toss it in the wash with the rest of baby's clothes and then let it air dry. Simple, sweet first toy.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Very engaging and bright rattle!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rattle! It is super bright and keeps baby engaged. It is his first rattle and even at 2 months he loves it! If he's fussy we just hold over him and shake it and he immediately stops to look at the bright colors and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Mama5b

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for our little poodle.
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for my toy poodle. He has other dog toys, but we had a baby visit our house, and he was fascinated by a rattle, but he couldn't have it, so I bought him his own. He's elderly and doesn't chew his toys open anymore. He likes this rattle and it seems like a really good quality rattle and it's easy to grip.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkcat

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: My baby can grab a bunch of other things but she is still unable to hold onto this toy. It is just not easy to grasp and it never held her attention. EDIT: now that my baby is 8 months, it is more useful
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Dirty, unhygienic item
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived dirty. Nothing else in the box would have rubbed off on it. The packaging had a fine green material on it. I’m worried it’s mold. The item itself was dirty even on the backside of the rattle. Pretty alarming considering this was going to be for a newborn. I’m really disappointed and would not order from them again. Not even for a replacement. I’ve lost trust.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Shildmyer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: We got it for our newborn and she loves it. The bells inside make soft noises as do the arms. She can hold it very easily now that she is a bit older. And loves to play with it. It is also super soft.
customer_reviews.author: C. Martina

customer_reviews.title: Good teethed rattle
customer_reviews.text: Baby really enjoys the sound, textures, and colors of this toy. The yellow head part does seem a little darker since cleaning it several times but it’s barely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 3 month-old. It's soft and has a nice rattle which isn't too loud but it definitely louder than another rattle we bought. She hasn't quite figured it out yet but it is colorful and cute.
customer_reviews.author: TChewy

customer_reviews.title: Great for a baby learning to grip!
customer_reviews.text: My baby who is 4 months and grabbing things loves this toy! It’s a favorite! I don’t leave the house without it! It’s a great small car seat toy too!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great fun rattle
customer_reviews.text: So nice I had to buy two. I took it out of the box and my Italian greyhound demanded it for himself! So I purchased another for the intended recipient, a colleagues new born baby it’s really sweet . And if you have a small dog it functions as a noisy soft frisbee
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rattle when my son was born and gave it to him at two months old. He had been learning to kick it with his feet to make it rattle and is now grasping the crinkle parts with his hands. He’s now 3 months and still loves this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Vann

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: 3 month old loves it .. Its lightweight and easily allows for a young baby to pick it up. Great for teething + keeping baby entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey F

customer_reviews.title: Great for teething and entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: Great for teething and entertaining! My daughter loves it!! It is also a rattle son she either puts it in her mouth or shake it for fun!! Also helps with her grasping skills! 100% recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Lara

customer_reviews.title: Great rattle at 3 months
customer_reviews.text: My son has just started to grab things, when I first got this he couldn't use it, but now it's easy to hold and shake and he chews (and drools) :) on it
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G

customer_reviews.title: cute teething toy
customer_reviews.text: The baby loves this teething toy. She chews on it all the time but also loves that it makes noises. She giggles when hears different sounds.
customer_reviews.author: wiseman07

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and worth the buck!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and it’s sooo cute!! I love that it’s soft so the baby won’t hurt himself with it and it’s easy for him to hold due to the fact that it’s a nice medium size! I loved it and so did the baby! 10/10 would recommend :)))!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect early toy
customer_reviews.text: This little toy has been great for babies early months. The colors and bell sound are attractive to little one.
customer_reviews.author: M Clan

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The four “feet” are easy for my five month old granddaughter to grab and hold onto. She loves the bright colors too! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Soft and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Babies have no coordination so if the toy hits them a few times while they’re playing with it’s safe and soft. It’s also easy to clean. I though mine in the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Baby’s favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Baby’s favorite toy! When my baby was 4 months old, she could easily hold it! It became her favorite rattler! Even withstood the washing machine even after a couple of washes!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and engaging toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect toy for a 5+ month old baby, the shape, rattle and bright colors plus the easy way for their little hands to hold it will make it one on their favorite toys. Plus it is machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great as a rattle to shake around, and she also likes chewing on the feet and antennas. It's a soft, flexible toy and she thinks it's hilarious when I squeeze the sides together to tickle her belly. She's had this since she was just a couple months old and still loves it now at almost 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: Duffman

customer_reviews.title: ... it was the cutest rattle and he seemed to love it. i was so very pleased to find ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement as my grandson’s original rattle which I bought for him while in Fla was lost and he needed an exact replacement as it was the cutest rattle and he seemed to love it. i was so very pleased to find it available via Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Rattle
customer_reviews.text: Little man's favorite rattle right now. Easy for small hands to hold and lots of bright colors to keep his attention.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 4month old has just learned to hold it. But I like the fact that its soft so he doesnt hurt himself when it falls or he hits himself with it!
customer_reviews.author: T Mason

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loved this toy (he's too old for it now). Gave one to a friend's daughter and it was a hit with her too.
customer_reviews.author: klbiegler

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this for my 3 month baby, she only now (4months) can actually hold, since the ring was too big for her hand. For teething is not so good, since the legs and arms of the bug are too big for her mouth... but as a rattle is great, since it is very soft so she can play safely with it
customer_reviews.author: Ana Laura Lopez Aguado

customer_reviews.title: Attractive toy for baby
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very attractive toy for the baby. It caught my son’s attention immediately. My son is 5 months old and it’s not easy for him to grab it in his hands now. I’m sure he will play it better in the next months.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon from IL

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for 4-5 month old
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my newborn Grandson. He is now 4 months old, and it is his favorite toy. He can easily hold and maneuver it, and loves to teeth on its “arms”. I have hand washed it, and it retains its shape And colors.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Krause

customer_reviews.title: Play time toy
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I don’t allow my child to put this in her mouth but it’s good to keep her distracted with. I don’t allow her since it’s cloth. But she has other plastic teething toys that are okay.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for babys
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves it like it LOVES IT. it's soft easy for babys to grab colorful it is fantastic you your face a baby ie long for addon gift this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Bobby E.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Perfect first rattle. Lightweight and makes crinkly sounds when she bites on it (teething starting)! The plastic ring attached makes it easy for her to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: My newborn love love loves this toy! Even at 2 weeks she would enjoy the crunching sounds on the toy along with the rattle!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Baby approved
customer_reviews.text: Has become a favorite of our teething baby. Rattle plus krinkle for the win. Definitely worth the $8 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toy for the first year :)
customer_reviews.text: When my son was about 10 weeks and VERY fussy, this toy was just the right amount of color, size, and noise. Now much older, he loves to teeth on it! Its been a year of fun with this little toy.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Elizabeth Urim

customer_reviews.title: Crinkly
customer_reviews.text: 5 month old likes the crinkly parts. And its easy enough to hold. I can't see how it will last too long though with all the slobbering it gets.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves the little jungle noise it makes. Very cute, she just holds it and shakes it around, she doesn't use it for teething
customer_reviews.author: grant

customer_reviews.title: 6 month old +
customer_reviews.text: Its for a 6 month old baby or more . The handle is big and hard for 3 month old to hold. But very nice looking toy.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Tario

customer_reviews.title: Great first rattle.
customer_reviews.text: Got for my grandson. 4 mo old. Can just start holding it and great to put around his wrist so he doesn't drop it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Nuzback

customer_reviews.title: I love how small and cushiony it is
customer_reviews.text: My three-month-old is just now learning how to grab and absolutely loves this little rattle bee. I love how small and cushiony it is. He loves how the the arms and the ears scrunch up when you touch them it's also very colorful but not too stimulating for his little brain. I would recommend this and I have bought this for all new moms in a gift basket.
customer_reviews.author: Krayfield

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My ston didn't readily know what to do with it at 3 months but at 4.5 months he could entertain himself for quite some time before dropping it and needing some assistance now at 5 months my baby can easily pick it up as he wishes and he enjoys the rattle and colors. The rattle is really nice and audible which I can't say for some other items I purchased on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great teething rattle
customer_reviews.text: My oldest had this rattle years ago and loved it for teething! I was so happy to find that they are still making these for my youngest. It is a soft rattle that also makes some crinkling noises. Babies love to chew on this and it is easy for them to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M

customer_reviews.title: Great first toy
customer_reviews.text: This was the first toy my baby ever responded to. She just loved it so much. At almost 7 months now, it’s still one of her favorite toys.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Alexander

customer_reviews.title: not using yet.
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that it does not have a plastic ring with small balls that could potentially break open and become a choking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Good Development Toy ( under 6 months )
customer_reviews.text: Grandson limes this toy. Good sound when rattled, he likes the crinkle sound as well. Good hand grasping toy.
customer_reviews.author: Tak1965

customer_reviews.title: Great for tummy time encouragement!
customer_reviews.text: Great to use while doing tummy time! I use it to get my LO's attention to keep his head up as I encourage him with positive words! He has been alot more alert lately and loving colors so this rattle is perfect! It's lightweight, colorful, and adorable! Definitely recommend for infants.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Baby's favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy so much I bought 2, one for at home and one for at daycare. He loves to chew on it for teething. Super easy to wash, I just put it in the washer and then air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: We loved it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter still plays with it from newborn to 11 months ! How they grow so fast . She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Lina N. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Daughter LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when my daughter was about a month old. At first I would hang it from her bouncer and let her look at it. Now that she is 4 months old, she loves to hold it and chew on it. She also loves the little bell sound. Great first toy purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: She bites and sucks just one antenna and bites the arms
customer_reviews.text: My daughter freakin loves this thing. She bites and sucks just one antenna and bites the arms. She calms down once ones of the appendages is in her mouth. Hilarious
customer_reviews.author: christine

product_meta.title: The First Years First Rattle
product_meta.description:
Just like the name says, this rattle is an ideal baby teething toy for your newborn! Inspired by the fact that babies love to grab on to their parent's fingers, this multi-textured rattle toy has easy-grip "fingers" of its own to encourage baby's early grasping skills. With soft teething surfaces and high-contrast patterns to encourage visual tracking, this baby rattle is the toy they'll reach for first.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This is an ideal first rattle for a newborn. Our inspiration for this Learning Curve Baby soft rattle was the fact that babies love to grab on to Mom and Dad's fingers. So we designed easy-grip "fingers" that encourage baby's early grasping skills. This multi-textured rattle features soft teething surfaces and high-contrast patterns to encourage visual tracking.
feature_bullets: BABY RATTLE: Multi textured rattle with high contrast patterns to encourage visual tracking
COMFORTABLE GRIP: Easy grip fingers encourage baby's early grasping skills
TEETHING TOYS: This rattle toy comes with soft teething surfaces

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,469 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
